job_title: Senior Analyst & AI Lead - Data Science
job_description:
JOB SUMMARY :

A subject matter expert responsible for end to end ownership of designing, execution and implementation of AIMLadvanced analytics roadmap across the organization to achieve improvement in process effectivenessbusiness outcomes with key focus on Customer facing business functions including Distribution, Customer service and Customer Retention.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES :

1. Define and develop approach to scale AIML agenda at Life and enable AIML as a strategic differentiator for business

2. Spearhead Data ScienceAI projects with complete ownership of design development, implementation and continuous monitoring.

3. Be a change agent, evangelize & enhances organization understanding on capabilities of AI ML. Work with senior leadership to understand business processes and proposing strategic use of AIML to enhance business outcomes.

4. Continuously tracks and assesses new advanced data sources, tools, techniques and technologies like vision, speech, conversational platforms and cloud stack, capable of solving insurance business problems and partners with business to champion the adoption of the same.

5. Design frameworks, experiments and perform technical evaluations for AI ML solution providers through quick POCs

6. Build and manage external relationships with Banca channel partners, to co-create integrated AI ML solutions and deploy at scale.

7. Bring thought leadership with collaboration with cross-industry academia forums for outside in perspective, seeking new and innovative approaches and to showcase our learning across various external forums

8. Build a business focussed, integrated and high performing team, with strong culture of solution delivery, continuous learning and experimentation.

9. Attract, recruit and coach talent to become next generation business focussed problem solvers.

Desired qualification and experience :

Education :

- MBA or Master's degree in Quantitative fields like mathematics, computer science, engineering, statistics, economics from premiere institutes

Experience :

- Minimum of 10+ years of related work experience in analytical roles

- Measures of Success

- Number of AIML use case implementation.

- Improvements in algorithm outcomes.

- No of new data dimensions or technologies leveraged

Key Relationships (Internal External) :

Internal - Senior leadership, business owners and Digital + Tech leaders

External - Partners, cross-industry academia forums.

Key competenciesskills required

- Domain understanding of insurance processes with, in depth understanding of distribution, renewals, customer service and persistency management.

- Demonstrated passion for AI ML Data Science with hands on experience in AI ML

- Applied Experience with, and detailed knowledge of machine learning technologies (XGBoost, Deep Learning, NLP etc) and applications.

- Experienced in various open source tools and technologies such as Python, R, Spark etc. ML DL frameworks like tensor flow, keras, AutoML, pytorch etc.

- Experience and understanding of working with cloud stack such as AWS and GCP leveraging AIML APIs

- Strong Project Management capabilities and ability to lead projects with multiple business stakeholders as a part of diversified team

- Strong collaborator with demonstrated abilities to challenge conventional thinking and influence stakeholders

Sr. Analyst - AI

Role & Responsibilities :

- Laison and collaborate with different business stakeholders and back end engineering teams to develop AI based solutions

- B uild data driven stories and present analysis output and solutions to all levels of the business

- Understand business processes, collect and integrate data from various data sources to be used for building the models. This could involve writing crawlers, connecting to databases for extracting data for training algorithms create features supporting hypothesis.

- Training and testing MLDL algorithms, perform iterative experiments with different techniques and features to discover best performing algorithm.

- Create frameworks to monitor algorithm performance and suggest measures for improvement.

- Perform data analysis from unstructured data to find meaningful and actionable business insights

- Assist in growing data science skills in the team, i.e. organizing learning activities, create x-pollination opportunities

- Work as a product owner and hold end to end responsibility for solutions

- Individual contributor role with minimal team management responsibilities

Desired Qualification & Expertise :

- Minimum 3 years (3-4 years) of hands on work experience in Data Science, with hands on Machine Learning, Deep Learning solutions development

- MTech ,MS, MSc. in Computer scienceInformation Technology ECE or other quantitative disciplines from tier 1 tier 2 institutes (IIT, IIIT, NIT, BITS, ISI,or other premiere institutions)

- Strong foundation and hands-on experience in implementing AI based solutions

- Should have developed and deployed MLDLNLP based solutions with Python

- Strong understanding and experience with Deep Learning - DNN, RNN, LSTM, and Attention models etc.

- Strong communication skills to collaborate with business teams, understand business processes, identify problems and find AIML driven solutions

- Strong background with advanced mathematical concepts and understanding of algorithms

- Working knowledge and understanding of voice and video data is a plus

- Experience in working with cloud infrastructure and high-performance computing (GPUTPU) be a plus

How do you know that you are fit for this role?

- You like solving business problems and you like data driven storytelling

- You have a hands-on experience across Machine Learning, Deep Learning, NLP and image matching algorithms using PySpark, Scikit-learn, and Tensor Flow etc.

- You have been part of a team developing AI-Machine Learning technologies with a strong background in advanced mathematical concepts and equally good understanding of algorithms.

- You can work with a lean team internally, and you are a self starter.

- You have an entrepreneurial attitude and enjoy end to end ownership and delivery

- You are passionate about solving business problems with AI

- You are process oriented, like solving business problems and you like data driven storytelling

- Enthusiastic self-learner keeping up with latest techniques, technology and market trends
education: B.Sc in Any Specialization, BCA in Any Specialization, B.Tech/B.E. in Any Specialization

Getting an understanding of the full CRM-ERP system and associated workflows.
Working closely with all Functional departments to understand the reports requirements, and design and build the BI dashboards.

Working very closely with the Analytics Manager to understand the org-level data handling strategy so that our existing warehouse connects to CRM-ERP data sources also seamlessly to produce end-to-end reports in future
Respond to ad-hoc reports and analysis requests from other teams as needed.
Be the bridge between CRM-ERP users and the management team, verifying and validating data, providing insights and holding the fort on the reporting side.
We re looking for a self-motivated, detail-oriented individual who loves digging into data, developing insights and communicating data-based recommendations. You will work closely with the internal teams and tech partners to implement your recommendations, track the impact and course correct.
The position will report to the Associate Director, Product Implementation. The person needs to be an out-of-the-box thinker and should be a strong believer and propagator of the use of open technologies.

job_description:
About the role
As a Data Analyst, you will help shape credit, business, and collections strategies by using
data-driven insights. As a key member of the team, you work closely with leadership, credit, and
business teams to craft and execute analytics-driven strategies for business growth.

What are we looking for?

Excellent coding skills: Python coding (a must skill) and developing SQL queries.
(Modelling techniques such as predictive and segmentation model understanding is a plus but not mandatory).
Prior experience in a fintech in the portfolio, risk, or collections team is a strong plus.
Strategic & Analytical Orientation: Exceptional Logical | Analytical | Reasoning skills complemented by rigor and strong quantitative orientation –
Do you stop at producing the results or do you dive deeper into the why’s, how’s, and ponder on ifs?
Strong communication skills: Impeccable written and oral communications, coupled with strategic influencing skills and the ability to drive agreement through intellect, interpersonal and negotiation skills
Can you communicate (present) your results with confidence?
Strong business judgment, leadership, and integrity: She/he should be a tenacious
problem solver with good judgment and an open-minded approach. One who pushes the envelope but is rooted in ground reality
Open to learning new tools & techniques and following the latest thinking globally in academia and the business world
Lastly, if you are exceptionally self-driven, motivated, and comfortable with ambiguity.
This is a place for you!

Execution: Includes the development of frameworks, hypotheses, tests, analysis and options, scope operational feasibility, leading implementation efforts and developing a monitoring plan
Develop data-driven solutions that enhance customer experience, optimize efficiency and mitigate risk.
Translate data mining results into a clear business-focused deliverable for decision-makers
Knowledge of how to leverage statistical models in algorithms is a plus
Multivariate analysis: identifying how several parameters can affect retention/behavior of the customer and identifying actions at different points of the customer lifecycle. What can you expect?
Showcasing and honing your skills in a leading fintech with data-driven decision-making at its core.
Work in a challenging environment with one of the best analytical mindset teams in the industry.
Riding the growth bandwagon of a high-growth company.
Flexibility to choose your career path toward Data Science modeling or analytics.

Preferred Qualifications & Experience

• Level of experience: 1 to 4 years

BE/MS/Ph.D./BTech in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Operations Research,
Physics, Statistics, or Economics (focus on FinTech is a plus).
Work experience from similar companies preferred with relevant work experience in
Business or Data Analytics.

You will guide product teams to plan data structures, processing, metrics definition, visualization, and data governance as they innovate new products.

job_description:
This Senior Data Engineer will need to have a successful history of data analysis, design, implementation and production deployment in critical, multi-business environments. This role will work closely with various Digital Product Insights, Analytics, Intelligence, Operations and Support teams in a highly collaborative environment to ensure that all types of data is securely collected, structured, and made accessible to support analytics, reporting, and insight generation. This data engineer will need to have strong experiences with Data Analysis, ETL, Data Warehousing, Data Architecture, Data Modeling, SQL, RDBMS and Big Data engineering. This data engineer is expected to design, implement, deploy, and support automated data pipes from various source systems to one or more target systems. Beyond technical capabilities this role will need to take diverse and changing requirements and turn them into actionable plans and deliver within a timely manner and within budget. The ideal candidate will have had experience in the high paced, high-energy startups as well as experience in the structured world of larger companies. The ideal candidate will also have experience applying Agile methodologies to the SDLC process.

Essential Functions:

Review business requirements with project teams to propose and produce technical documentation such as dataarchitecture, data modeling, data dictionary, source to target mapping with transformation rules, ETL data flow design, and test cases.

Discover, explore, analyze and document data from all source and target systems to better understand the total scope of Data Availability at JPMC.

Participate in the Agile development process to develop automated data pipes.

Optimize queries, data aggregations, and data pipes and improve data models in order to optimize and improve data delivery performance.

Collaborate with Operations, Platform, and DBAs teams to test and deploy implementations into Production and provide Production support as needed.

Collaborate with other data engineers to provide development coverage, support, and knowledge sharing and mentoring of junior team members.

Escalate issues and concerns as needed.



8 years of experience working in a technical environment as an engineer or developer.

5 years of hands-on experience with data architecture, data modeling, database design and data warehousing.

5 years of hands-on experience an ETL tool like Pentaho, DataStage, Informatica, or Ab Initio.

5 years of hands-on experience with SQL development and query performance optimization.

5 years of hands-on experience with data mining and data analysis.

JOB DESCRIPTION:
Chubb is the worlds largest publicly traded property and casualty insurer. With operations in 54 countries, Chubb provides commercial and personal property and casualty insurance, personal accident and supplemental health insurance, reinsurance and life insurance to a diverse group of clients. Chubb is also defined by its extensive product and service offerings, broad distribution capabilities, exceptional financial strength and local operations globally.




Ideal candidate for this role is someone with a strong background in P&C underwriting product knowledge, business and data analysis who is eager to work with large complex datasets in a big data environment. You are adept at implementing prefill data solutions for P&C products using external data sources and data science models. You have a critical eye for perceiving actionable insights from multitude of data sources ranging from structured and unstructured. You have an innate ability to enage, influence and champion innovative solutions and are never afraid to come up with out of the box solutions to traditional P&C underwriting. You are a self-starter who will take ownership of your projects and deliver high-quality data-driven analytics solutions.
Primary Job Responsibilities:
• Work independently with underwriting product managers and business partners, analyze the underwriting questions and determine the best external sources for answering such questions using vendor data, webscraping, machine learning models.
• Evaluate and qualify new External data vendors to bring into 360 big data platform; review data dictionary; perform data mapping; perform detailed comparative analysis of external data to internal data; present findings to key stakeholders
• Develop ETL rules for creating new data attributes; conflation rules and confidence score logic for merging data from different vendors
• Utilize data analysis skills within and outside of the developing Chubb information ecosystem for discovery, analytics and data management
• Perform detailed product/portfolio level analysis on hit rate, fill rate to assess digital data solution effectiveness on each underwriting question/data attributes; obtain approval from Product Managers and business stake holders; provide post implementation support especially around any major deviations from projected hit rate, fill rate etc.
• Build strong relationships with external data vendors to ensure conformity of data, quality check, development of new data attributes, exploring additional usage of their data
• Work closely with Digital IT to implement data solutions; participate in scrum meetings; Act as a subject matter expert to provide business support in defining requirements
• Perform User Acceptance Testing for monthly data refreshes;
• Work with various relational and non-relational data sources with the target being Azure based SQL Data Warehouse & Cosmos DB repositories
• Work closely with the Data Science and Data Engineering team to perform complex analytics and data preparation tasks; measure performance of data solutions implemented via API’s, QlikView dashboards etc.; spearhead data labeling efforts for machine learning models

• Excellent understanding of how technology impacts the business

The person is expected to continuously identify opportunities for improvements, spot trends, as well as recognize potential data related issues and drive their resolution. The person will closely work with LKQ European business teams, with primary focus on
expansion and standardization of Reporting database
development of new LKQ Europe BI system - Incorta (in close cooperation with LKQ IT teams in Europe and India) and
overall improvement of awareness and trust in LKQ Europe business data.

Essential Job Duties:
The candidate will be required to work in a dynamic data environment with constantly evolving business requirements and would benefit from strong self-organization and business / data analytical background. Previous experiences with BI implementation in the areas of building dashboards, ad-hoc reports are welcomed.
The main duties and responsibilities of a Data Analyst include:
Ensuring spend is contracted, categorised and risks mitigated
Responsible for preparing dashboard, reports to track progress against targets and suggest actions with root cause analysis.

Implementation and on-going management of systems and processes

Develop and populate analytical models to review qualitative and quantitative evaluations and costing scenarios during the bidding process
Develops and manages ongoing compliance, performance monitoring, and savings reporting Develop and execute projects to enhance procurement operations.
As a part of Procurement Analytics team which provides analytical outcomes and insights derived from internal/external data to the procurement organizations, enabling them to make fact-based decisions and to gain competitive advantages leading to lower costs, greater profits, and reduced risks
Spend analysis, TCO/clean sheet costing, contract analysis, supplier identification, saving idea/lever identification, sourcing strategy, development, RFQ management and analysis, negotiation strategy development and tracking mechanism development
The individual must possess strong communication and analytical skills so that he/she can interact effectively with different Competency Centers to evaluate business requirements and advise on appropriate, informative reporting practices and dashboards. Ability to comprehend and translate complex data and technical topics into understandable business language.
He/she should perform other duties as assigned.

Education: Business Administration, Business Information Systems, Computer Science or Data Science

Experience:
5+ years of experience with data related activities from complex international environment
Advance level of proficiency in MS Office programs (specially in MS excel /Power point) & Power Bi reports development.
Demonstrated ability to work in ambiguous situations and across organizational boundaries
Strong technical and analytical skills together with ability to effectively communicate with various multinational and cross-functional teams.
Self-starter and result oriented, with fluent English (both verbal and written) and advanced Excel knowledge.

Definition of retail analyst
Retail data analytics is the process of collecting and studying retail data (like sales, inventory, pricing, etc.) to discover trends, predict outcomes, and make better business decisions. Done well, data analytics allows retailers to get more insight into the performance of their stores, products, customers, and vendors

Retail Analyst Job Description
Responsibilities:
1. Researching industry trends such as consumer buying habits or technological advances that may impact the industry in the future
2. Analyzing data such as revenue growth rates & inventory turnover rates.
3. Sales forecasting for online and offline sales.
4. Defining marketing strategies for specific products or services based on consumer preferences
5. Developing brand awareness through advertising campaigns such as television ads or social media posts and analyzing the same to better understand future campaigns.
6. Recommending new products or services based on market trends and customer preferences.

JD for BI-GCP Bigquery:
Looking for Data Analyst having 5 years of experience in GCP, BigQuery and having knowledge of any ETL Tools. Basic knowledge of Python. Candidate should have good analytical and problem solving skills. Good verbal and written communication.

Location: Pune

Notice Period-Immediate/45 Days

Experience:5+ Yrs

If interested kindly share your resume on below mail id
sakshiag@cybage.com

Responsibilities:
Create an analytics roadmap and framework for the business and ensure successful implementation in aws environment.
Partner closely with CXOs & functional leaders in Acquisition, Product, Growth/Retention/CRM, Customer Support, Fraud, and Marketing by identifying areas where analytics could help solve existing problems or strengthen business operations.
Apply problem-solving frameworks to break the complex business problems faced by the BUs and organization into smaller more manageable problems and translate the business problem into data and analytics problems.
Identify various business opportunities and apply analytics to optimize conversions, fraud and risk.
Generate actionable recommendations based on huge platform data and communicate the insights generated by the teams.
Share reports and dashboards with business stakeholders to empower them to make data-driven decisions.
Manage transformation projects that help to improve the top line or bottom line through an analytical solution.
Be the champion of data and insight-led decision making in the organization and drive change management efforts to bring stakeholders on board.
Lead a team of Business Analysts and Data Engineers, delegate responsibilities as per various business requirements & train them in different areas of expertise.
Build Pipelines to mine data from different data sources like RDS, Click Stream Data and store in a single data lake in s3.
Build things for scale , as we are growing everyday, new data will be added to the lake exponentially.
Add Data governance policy, regular data audits and define access rules for different data users.
Coming up with hypothesis for different scenarios as per business needs and provide A/B testing framework to implement and evaluate different cohorts

Requirements:
Preferably 5-8 years of experience in the Analytics domain either at the Brand side or as a consultant at the agency end.
Experience working with SQL to manipulate medium/large data sets from multiple sources
Should have worked on any of the data visualization tools like Power BI, Tableau, Qliksense, Zoho Analytics, Looker, Domo etc.
Ability to process complex data sets through scripting language (such as R, Python) or other method
Ability to perform exploratory data analysis to discover interesting trends and relationships
Experience applying statistical modeling, clustering models, machine learning, NLP, and other quantitative techniques to solve business problems
Possess understanding of and ability to communicate statistics to experts and non-experts
Creative thinker who has proven ability to innovate through data exploration and application of solutions
Ability to thrive in an environment that requires flexibility, agility and multi-tasking
Ability to take initiative and work with high level of independence
Strong technical and remote collaboration skills are a must
Excellent organization, analytical, and planning skills

Role:
I. Practice Management and Administration:
o Monthly MIS collation for verticals
o Maintain track of Debtors, Budget variance and Annual Budget Estimates
o Tracking the list of tasks or to dos of vertical leads and maintain the tracker and follow up on time and document the delays in submission, if any
II. Organisation initiative Management:
o 5 year Plans, Annual plans in October, Annual budgets in January
o Quarterly org structure review and changes if any - continuous monitoring and get changes done where required
o Follow up on action taken on central SOP meeting minutes
III. Operation:
o Schedule the Operations call for verticals
o Attend the operation meeting and prepare the list of follow up items and circulate with timelines
IV. Marketing and sales:
o Manage and remind for meetings as per sales engagement plan
o Follow up meetings or emails post meetings if any - Every month list of follow ups to be discussed
o Liaise with SM team for department level initiatives
V. General:
o Scheduling of calls, whenever required
o Assist in consolidation of any other Management/Central team requirement
o Contribute in various Corporate Level Initiatives
o Preparation of Executive Summary
o Support in Digital Initiatives

Core Responsibilities

Lead the digital transformation journey
Collects and compiles HR metrics and data from a variety of sources including the human resource information system (HRIS) and payroll outputs, management and employee surveys, exit interviews, employment records, government labour statistics, competitors practices, and other sources.
Analyses data and statistics for trends and patterns with attention to recruitment, hiring practices, motivation, turnover, and compliance with employment laws and regulations.
Prepares reports of data results, presenting and explaining findings to senior leadership.
Identifies and recommends reasonable short- and long-term goals, milestones, and benchmarks for key performance metrics.
Based on metrics and analysis, makes recommendations for policies and activities to improve the organizational culture including suggestions to attract and hire qualified candidates, to motivate and retain employees, to address staffing issues, and to maintain legal compliance.
May conduct or assist with conducting classification audits to ensure that jobs are properly classified as exempt or non-exempt.
Ensures compliance with data privacy regulations and best practices.
May guide and/or assist with performance, benefit, and compensation review and evaluation processes.
Performs other duties as assigned.
IV. KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS
Measurable Deliverables

Completion of all HR digital project as per the Project charter
Timely and correct information
Create new tracker / file as per the business requirements
V. JOB REQUIREMENTS
Minimum Qualifications

Graduation / MBA in HR is preferred
Experience

3-6 years

The Data Analyst and Project Manager position- is part of the core Virtue team.- The- person in this position is responsible for identifying and solving important complex- business- problems- while utilizing- their- advanced analytics, data management and modeling skills. On a day to day basis this role involves working closely with- US and UK delivery team, managing the data, building and executing ML models, documenting approach and results and helping with the weekly client deliverables, which will include creating presentations in power point,- conducting- market research and- performing ad-hoc- analysis.

job_description:
The Data Analyst will work as a part of the Supplier IO Data Operations team and will be responsible for studying, gathering, and analyzing data from various databases and sources. He/she must develop reports, summaries, and visual representations and is responsible for the implementation and delivery execution of supplier.io s products and services to customers, and the data governance and maintenance of supplier.io s master database. The Data Delivery Specialist function is responsible for preparing, processing, auditing, and verifying data delivered to customers.

What You Will Do
Responsible for secondary and primary research, collecting data from different sources and data analysis of cross industries and company
Research and analysis in cross industries domain and analyze Suppliers details
Create/Update US/Global Data as per the client requirements adhering to the Client Needs..., accomplished through secondary research.
Collect Analyze the data ( Locations Contacts ) collected from different sources (like Websites, LinkedIn, ZoomInfo, Hoovers, Insideview, Xing and other ) along with source link for future reference.
Intermediate skillset in excel, in using various function, Documentation skills.
Create and maintain Excel worksheets, web tools to ensure accurate, centralized client data needs.
Perform research on companies to ensure the quality of supplier.io s master database.
Research and decide which data source is correct when two or more data sources have different information for the same data point.
Perform quality assurance checks on data supplier.io and prepares for customer deliverables.
Understand and collect data as per the requirements ensure data process is configured according to customer requirements.
Performs quality assurance audits on data results ensuring proper data formatting, data content, and customer requirements are met.
Utilize various software packages and tools for collecting and reporting data.
Must demonstrate strong analytical, problem identification and problem resolution skills.
Ability to apply existing analytic methods and tailor to client needs.
Must be an excellent team player, as well as be self-directed.
Must have the ability to work independently and manage communications up and down.
Ensure confidentiality, timeliness, and accuracy in the analysis of all related data activities.
Executes the data process, audits each step, and prepares data files, including Excel reports using formulas and templates.
Assist with troubleshooting and resolving data issues identified by internal project managers and/or clients.
Document client s custom processes to ensure proper steps are executed during next scheduled data process.
Document and share data product issues/errors with Data Management team and/or Product team to ensure proper resolution is identified and implemented.
Cleansing and De-duping Data for Data Quality, Data analysis and research, Formatting data and consolidation
What You Will Need to Succeed

Bachelor of Engineering / Bachelor of Technology or Master s in Science / Bachelor of Science with Computers.
3-5 Years work experience in data analysis / research (Primary Secondary Research).
Research data from Web and other available platform s, different sources (like Websites, LinkedIn, ZoomInfo, Hoovers, Insideview, Xing and other )
2-4 years of experience in Excel, Using formula functions. Proficient in MS Office
Knowledge in any RDBMS - SQL Server (Optional).
Knowledge in any ETL/ Reporting tools (Optional).
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Ability to interpret and handle data. Strong problem solving and analytical skills.
Excellent team player abilities with good interpersonal and behavior skills
Flexibility to work in shifts. (India / UK Hours)
education: B.Sc in Chemistry, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial

Research, summarize, and gather customer business requirements

Roles and Responsibilities
Recruit, train and develop a team with skills and experience aligned to meet PROs needs and the market with a focus on retention of top performers
Build a strong culture of accountability, accuracy and high performance
Implement an effective onboarding and training plan for every team member
Set clear expectations for all team members. Analyze goals, activities and results to determine action plans to improve individual and team performance per stated performance management guidelines.
Ensure that values are being demonstrated and policies are being followed.
Leads the identification and implementation of reporting processes, metrics, methods, tools, guidelines and standards in order to establish a stable framework that works across our client base.
Develop a strategic approach to effective program reporting, that reduces the need for conflicting, manual, redundant and ad hoc reporting & enhance scalability & control
Identifies and recommends the use of best practices and techniques regarding reporting requirements - naming conventions, terminology, engagement definitions, testing methods, etc.
Help refine & improve strategy for self-service reporting including identification of key technology, data sources and KPI calculations
Regularly reviews and evaluates opportunities to improve the reporting and analytical processes to achieve a higher maturity of performance management

Desired Candidate Profile


Perks and Benefits

Cimpress India is looking for Lead Data Analysts for remote locations across India.

What You Will Do:
Be immersed in a product team (e.g., Product Owners, Data Scientists, Data Engineers) where you will collaborate with stakeholders and build data products, and continually bring forward ideas and insights to drive value for our customers.
Data Exploration, Visualization, and Dashboarding. Identify trends and drivers, perform exploratory data analyses and create self-service views to drive understanding and empower our stakeholders.
Data Analysis and Modeling. Incorporate multiple data sources and apply advanced analytics methodologies (e.g. customer segmentation, lifetime value modeling, propensity matching), to better understand and retain our customers and drive customer loyalty.
Design and execute a/b/n tests to optimize the customer experience and analyze results to provide insightful recommendations to the business.
Collaborating in a fast paced, agile environment that focuses on delivering customer value early and often.
Value driven impact partner for key business stakeholders, influencing strategy and growth opportunities.
Mentor junior analysts and guide their work to deliver best-in-class analytics for stakeholders.

Your Qualifications:
Passionate about data and technology. You are an expert in SQL and Python. You have deep experience in using data presentation/visualization tools such as Looker, Tableau or PowerBI.
Inquisitive by nature. You are comfortable with exploratory analysis and statistical techniques and are driven to find meaningful patterns and trends in the data.
A resourceful and driven problem solver. You enjoy and have demonstrated ability tackling complex problems, drawing inferences from data, and using your analysis skills and eye for business to identify solutions. You have excellent organizational skills, strong attention to detail and ability to effectively deliver on projects supporting multiple business partners.
Team-minded and versatile. You have experience and an interest in partnering with multi-functional team members who come to the table with different perspectives. You are open to creative approaches to solving problems.
Experienced. 7+ yearsin analytics with 5+ years in an eCommerce environment preferred, and a bachelors degree in Business, Mathematics, Statistics, Computer Science, Engineering, Economics or related field; masters degree preferred.

The Analytics and Insights Group (AIG) is part of the Data Science function and focuses on the practical application of Data Science for energy disaggregation in the millions of homes across the globe served by Bidgely through its utility clients. The core of Bidgely s products are Energy Disaggregation/Itemization, which is derived from Algorithms Machine Learning models built by the Data Scientists.
This role is for leading a team within AIG which is focused on product analytics, energy efficiency programs, and metrics tracking and analytics. The team focuses on analytics around Bidgely products, customer engagement, energy efficiency as well as validating all dashboards and metrics tracked by Bidgely. The role will be responsible for the quality of analytics performed within the team and will be expected to constantly work towards developing and evolving the methodologies deployed. The lead should act as a sentinel in our quest to ensure that our products are delivering the best possible results to the Utility customers.
Responsibilities
Own the product analytics of bidgely s end user facing products, measure and identify areas of improvement through data
Liaise with Product Managers and Business Leaders to understand product issues, priorities and hence support them through relevant product analytics
Own the automation of product analytics through good SQL knowledge
Develop early warning metrics for production and highlight issues and breakdowns for resolution
Resolve client escalations and concerns regarding key business metrics
Define and own execution
Deliver data backed analysis and statistically proven solutions
Research and implement best practices
Mentor team of analysts
Requirements
B.Tech from premiere institute with 5+ years analytics experience or Full time MBA from a premier b-school with 3+ years of experience in analytics/ business or product analytics
Bachelor s degree in Business, Computer Science, Computer Information Systems, Engineering, Mathematics, or other business/analytical disciplines
Proven analytical and quantitative skills and an ability to use data and metrics to back up assumptions, develop business cases, and complete root cause analyses
Excellent understanding of retention, churn and acquisition of user base
Ability to employ statistics and anomaly detection techniques for data-driven analytics
Ability to put yourself in the shoes of the end customer and understand what product excellence means
Ability to rethink existing products and use analytics to identify new features and product improvements.
Ability to rethink existing processes and design new processes for more effective analyses
Strong SQL knowledge, working experience with Looker and Tableau a great plus
Strong commitment to quality visible in thoroughness of analysis and techniques employed
Strong project management and leadership skills
Excellent communication (oral and written) and interpersonal skills and an ability to effectively communicate with both business and technical teams
Ability to coach and mentor analysts on technical and analytical skills
Good knowledge of statistics, basic machine learning and AB Testing is preferable
Experience as a Growth hacker and/or in Product analytics is a big plus
education: B.B.A/ B.M.S in Management, Any Graduate, B.Tech/B.E. in Production/Industrial

As a Lead Collections Data Analyst at , you will join ZeroFox s Cyber Threat Intelligence (CTI) Collections team: a group of highly skilled analysts, collectors, and specialists who dedicate themselves to protecting customers and their assets from digital and physical security threats. With our proprietary hybrid intelligence platforms and methodologies, you will utilize your collection, analysis, and leadership skills to identify compromised data threats, conduct technical processing, and generate intelligence for our customer base. Threat intelligence activities include tracking current and emerging threats covering cyber crime and various forms of malicious exploitation. If things like the dark web, big data, and cyber sleuthing are exciting to you, we want to talk! Discretion, teamwork, and creativity are a must.
Responsibilities
Process and parse large datasets with sensitive information leaked online
Identify new sources of threat activity and oversee daily collection and monitoring
Produce high-quality tactical intelligence written reports based on findings in various open-source, deep, and dark web environments
Track the tactics, techniques, and procedures used to conduct cybercrime and other threat activity
Use ZeroFox platforms and traditional cybersecurity toolsets to perform collection and analysis functions
Support ad hoc, client-specific requests based on the tasks mentioned above
Follow best practices of operational security to safeguard sources and methods
Support team productivity and outputs during your assigned shift
Qualifications
Successful experience in a threat intelligence or cybersecurity role, typically obtained in 3+ years
Strong familiarity with parsing and manipulating large datasets for technical analysis
Working knowledge of Python, JavaScript, Go, or other scripting required
Strong leadership skills with a desire to mentor and train junior members
Solid experience with open-source, deep, or dark web collection and analysis
Proven research and writing skills with outstanding attention to detail

MediaMath helps the worlds top brands deliver personalized digital advertising across all connected touchpoints. Over 9,500 marketers in 42 countries use our demand-side platform every day to launch, analyze, and optimize their digital advertising campaigns across display, native, mobile, video, audio, digital out of home, and advanced TV formats.
MediaMath initiated an industry-wide effort to create a 100% accountable, addressable and aligned supply chain through SOURCE ecosystem. SOURCE by MediaMath is a technical and commercial framework for agencies, brands, tech companies, and content owners designed to provide long-term sustainable solutions for a clean digital media supply chain with brand-safe, viewable inventory. MediaMath has offices in 15 cities worldwide and is headquartered in New York City.
Key Responsibilities
MediaMath s Analytics team is currently seeking a Lead Data Analyst with the knowledge, passion, and capability to mine complex datasets, discover and deliver insights that drive value for our clients and internal teams. The analytics team works on reporting, statistical and predictive modeling, and serves as leaders for advanced analyses for both clients and internal teams like Product and Ecosystem. The ideal candidate has the appropriate blend of technical capabilities, business acumen, and analytical skills to be a part of a team that focuses on the largest challenges of AdTech and uncovers actionable insights that drive revenue.
You will:
Develop a deep understanding of MediaMath databases and their architecture
Partner with the account and sales team to identify client s analytical and reporting needs and present solutions
Partner closely with product and supply team members on designing experiments around bid shading, supply path optimization (among other initiatives) and ultimately proving/disproving hypothesis that translates into large impact business decisions
Help Data Science and Optimization teams improve algorithms and models
Automate reports
Create materials (client facing and internal) that package and promote Analytics offerings
Design innovative and exciting reports and analyses and fully own projects from scope to execution
Articulate results of data analysis to clients and internal groups; translate technical results to a non-technical audience
Develop a deep understanding of MediaMaths algorithms and bidder logic, how it impacts auction dynamics, and utilize that knowledge to interpret trends in auction data
Produce strategic insights with a service level of consistent quality to partners and stakeholders, including Executives, Product, Marketing, Sales, etc
You have:
8+ years of experience working at a start-up or tech company in an analytical role
In-depth knowledge of Python, SQL, Scala. Experience with Databricks a plus.
Experience with statistical modeling (e.g linear and logistic regressions), recommendation engines, forecasting
Initiative to improve on existing processes and create new ones.
You are:
An excellent problem-solver and have strong analytical skills
Good with multi-tasking, time management and prioritizing projects and deliverables
A strong communicator ability to distill key ideas for a non-mathematical audience
Collaborative and team focused

This position is an individual contributor role working amongst a team of analysts to design and develop analytical reporting and solutions. Collaborate with key stakeholders and members of the Cyber defense team to develop and maintain create data analytics strategy with a focus on business value.

About CE team

The Customer Experience team represents the voice of Myntra's customers. This team has an enterprise wide vision and works with all functions (Supply Chain, Category, Technology, Contact Center, Marketing & Revenue, Operations, and Cataloging etc) to ensure sustained performance across every leg of the customer journey. This entails strong cross functional understanding and stakeholder management to drive immediate action and process changes.

More importantly, the team defines the long term strategy that drive step change growth in customer experience. These are initiatives and investments that will create a world class standard for online fashion and lifestyle consumption experience for Myntra customers (e.g. Try & Buy, Next Day Delivery, Alterations, Product Quality, Forward & Reverse Logistics Experience), while improving customer metrics that influence long term business growth (Engagement, Retention, Life Time Value, Advocacy) and differentiating Myntra from the competition.

The team is comprised of a strong mix of analytical storytellers who turn data into actions. It also owns the customer experience index and is entrusted with providing the organization real time consumer insights. To that end, it relies on diverse capabilities including a strong analytics team, VOC Analysis, Market Research Cell, Customer Immersion Program and a store front lab.

Strong process orientation and knowledge

Independent - Ability to function with no/minimum supervision

Roles and Responsibility

Data Analysts are core to our business model. Working as specialist members of small teams, they are responsible for:
Performing exploratory data analyses, generating, and testing working hypotheses, preparing, and analysing historical data and identifying patterns
Researching and implementing appropriate machine learning algorithms and tools, selecting relevant datasets and data representation methods, running ML tests and experiments and fine-tuning using test results
Analyzing data using a programming language such as Python, R, SQL or SAS
Leverages advanced statistical analysis methods to create insightful recommendations and conclusions that may be communicated to the stakeholder
Formulating definitive data and strategy driven recommendations and presenting them in a client ready presentation
Working directly with clients and FJ team members on a day to day basis to identify business needs, frame a solution and seek the data to solve the problem. This may also include reviewing publications and interviewing appropriate industry experts
Building and maintaining client relationships by following high professional standards
In addition to these responsibilities, we encourage you to contribute in myriad ways limited only by your imagination.
Minimum and Preferred Qualifications
Bachelors degree with strong academic performance from premier institutions such as IITs, NITs, BITS Pilani, ISI, CMI. The degree must be in a quantitative field (Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, Information Management)
Expert in Python, with knowledge of fuzzy string matching algorithms like Jaro Wrinkler, Soundx, Levinstine, Damerau-Levenshtein Distance, TD-IDF etc. 
Understanding of ML frameworks, libraries, data structures, data modeling, and software architecture.
Ability to apply Machine Learning using Python, specifically in string comparison and matching. 
1+ years of hands-on experience with Python/R/SAS, 3-5 years of experience in data science
Knowledge of SQL, interfacing of text files with SQL
Possess excellent analytical skills and attention to detail. Hunger to keep up with the latest trends in advanced analytics
Strong communication skills enabling you to clearly communicate your thoughts/work to the client or internal teams both verbally and in writing
High levels of motivation, professionalism, integrity, team, and entrepreneurial spirit
Willingness to travel to client meetings and do client-site work as needed
Ability to handle multiple workstreams and be able to deliver best results under high pressure situations
Hands on experience with data science techniquesponsibilities


Desired Candidate Profile


Perks and Benefits
Fischer Jordan. Being a small team, each team member is encouraged to present their insights to the Partners on a regular basis.
Solve difficult and important problems for CXOs from Fortune 500 companies across multiple industries and domains. If you like the overlap of business, mathematics, and technology, and enjoy working in a fast-paced environment, this role is tailormade for you.

We hire from top engineering colleges (IITs and BITS) and Delhi University colleges and are committed to building a diverse team, thus ensuring holistic development of each team member.

job_title: Role: Product Analyst ( Product and Data analysis)
job_description:
This role is on our Analytics team. This team partners with Product, Marketing, and Finance to produce world-class analysis and provide recommendations that improve our products and increase customer engagement. The role will require a mix of Product and Data analytics, details as below:

Product/Business Analysis: ( Product analysis, Customer segmentation/ behavior/retention /conversion analysis, CLV, CTR, DAU, Funnel Analysis, product matrix analysis, business improvement and impact analysis, Ab Testing experiment analysis.) and

Data Analysis: Strong experience in SQL (data extraction and insights), Web analytics tools (Google, adobe, MixPanel etc.), Statistical analytics and predictive modeling, Dashboard, KPI improvements, insight and recommendation, BI Tool knowledge, Python/R will be good to have

What will you do
Conduct in-depth analysis to uncover opportunities for improving our products.
Work closely with business partners to extract meaningful insights using a variety of data sources: relational databases, front-end analytics tools, clickstream data, etc.
Present insights and recommendations to executive leadership using high quality visualizations and concise messaging.
Design and analyze A/B tests to drive KPI improvements.
Build models to predict customer behavior and better understand the drivers of customer engagement and retention.
Develop dashboards to inform business decisions with an emphasis on automation and scalability.
Collaborate with Engineering to advance data infrastructure and governance.

Required Technical and Professional Expertise:
Experience in performing quantitative analysis, preferably for an internet or technology company as an individual contributor
Self-starter with a desire to learn and the ability to rapidly understand the business and its drivers.
Ability to handle multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment.
Ability to write complex SQL queries to extract data from a variety of internal sources.
Solid understanding of Statistics with ability to explain statistical concepts to non-technical audiences.
Proficiency with BI tools such as Tableau, Looker, or equivalent.
Knowledge of programming languages such as Python/R preferred.

Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise:
Experience with Google Analytics, MixPanel or other front-end analytical platforms a plus.
effective communication and presentation skills
ability to translate business problems into analytics questions

job_description:
Requirements:


Strong theoretical and practical knowledge of advanced Statistical and analytical techniques like predictive response modelling, clustering, customer life time value, time series analysis, Market Basket Analysis, CHAID Segmentation.



Demonstrated experience in translating analytical model findings to business insights and communicating the same to non-technical audiences.



Should initiate and manage the data gathering and finding the problems and Data cleansing & transformation.



Deliver on analytics requests mostly unsupervised. Ability to understand business problem and convert it into an analytical problem.



Should be able to draft a project plan defining what the objective/problem is and able to devise appropriate analytical solution(s), identify all the intermediary activities to reach the end state and complete the activities within the stipulated timelines.



Identify and define business rules, metrics and key performance indicator.



Communicate with data science/IT team to get required data parameters.



Continuous impact assessment reports should be monitored and addressed by the analyst



Interpret the solutions in terms of the Business impact and the solutions need to be backed up by high-quality reasoning and data-points.



Build predictive models from start-to-finish (i. e. extract data, manipulate data, build model and validate model) and then deploy model on real data and track model performance.



Periodical review of effectiveness of models to determine readiness for business use.



Work with data team to understand the data availability and quality for analytic use, establish new data sources (with the DBA) where necessary.



Quickly grasp and implement new and advanced Statistical techniques to arrive at appropriate solution(s) for better decision making.



Develop detailed documentation of best practices, model implementation framework and manuals for all analytical tasks/activities.



Experience across several industry verticals is most desired (specifically Manufacturing, Government, Public Sector, etc. ).

Responsibilities in Brief:

Develop data science capabilities leading to revenue generation and drive growth for the company



Develop Proof-of-Concept capabilities with a quick turnaround to meet the needs of Business Stakeholders.



Leverage data management processes and available infrastructure / API tools to develop Proof-of-Concept Capabilities/Solutions in Big Data.



Extensive data mining operations on financial and non-financial data.



You have a passion for empirical research, a desire to work on challenging data problems around the predictive analytics and a demonstrated ability to learn and innovate



Ability to create a strong network of relationships among peers, internal partners, and external constituencies



Comfortable communicating with and receiving feedback from both technical and non- technical audiences

Key Skills

Data Analytics, Data Mining, Statistics

job_description:
About the role:

As Data Analyst- Technology Consulting, you will be key member of the teams working on end-to-end AI and analytics solutions being built for our clients. While your primary focus will be on the data engineering and application engineering components of the overall solution, you will collaborate with internal data science teams for the ML aspects. As the person responsible for the overall success of the program, you will:

• Use data systems to help gather, measure, organize, and analyse data
• Using statistical tools to interpret data sets, paying particular attention to trends and patterns that could be valuable for diagnostic and predictive analytics efforts.
• Demonstrating the significance of their work in the context of local, national, and global trends that impact both their organization and industry.
• Preparing reports for executive leadership that effectively communicate trends, patterns, and predictions using relevant data.
• Collaborating with programmers, engineers, and organizational leaders to identify opportunities for process improvements, recommend system modifications, and develop policies for data governance.

Required Skills & Experience:

• Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or related disciplines with strong mathematical & numeracy skills.
• 5+ years of overall IT industry experience
• Excellent working knowledge of SQL, Python and spreadsheet tools like Excel
• Excellent analytical skills - the ability to identify trends, patterns, and insights from data.
• Intermediate understanding of databases such as SQL Server, Oracle and working knowledge of cloud data platforms like Azure Synapse, AWS Redshift etc.
• Understanding of reporting & data visualisation tools such as PowerBI, Tableau or Qlik
• Understanding of website scripts such as XML, Javascript, JSON.
• Understanding of ETL framework and ETL tools including Alteryx and Microsoft SSIS.
• Presentation skills – ability to write and speak clearly to easily communicate complex ideas in a way that is easy to understand.
education: B.Tech/B.E. in Computers, BCA in Computers, B.Sc in Computers

job_description:
Designation- Backend operation manager

Department- Back end Operations

Grade Assistant Manager / Deputy Manager

Education Qualification – Graduate / B.Tech / MBA

Work Experience – 1-4 Yrs

Location - Gurgaon

Requirement


- Sound Knowledge of Mortgage / finance industry.

- Excellent Knowledge of MS Office specially MS Excel

- Knowledge of SAS / SQL / PYTHON.

- Daily Coordination and communication with Vendors / Insurance Partners.

- Good communication and interpersonal skill

- Prepare Daily / Weekly /Monthly MIS as required by the management

- Capability to improve the operational system , policies and processes. Specially , better management reporting, business processes.

1) Inventory and Dispatch Planning in Coordination with collection team to plot future shipments from Consignees to the Packers.
2) Updation of Import Tracking sheet and sharing with Customer Service Team.
3) Preparing of TA Bond(s) and Execute at Source Port(s) / FTWZ(s).
4) Keeping appropriate records of Import shipments coming to India under GDPK TA Bond(s) and allocation of BOE(s).
5) Price negotiation with Transporters for Adhoc services, timely placement of vehicles at origin to meet the delivery schedule.
6) Tracking of TA Bond validity and Cancellation process within a stipulated Time frame.
7) Coordination with Overseas Company Regions and LSP(s) for upcoming Import shipment status.
8) Verifying Shipping Documents (EXIM), Verifying draft BL for correct narrations.
9) Sharing Invoice & PL updating complete details to execute the Import shipments from overseas / FTWZ(s) and verifying the BOE Check List.
10)Prior intimation to the Liners, FTWZ, Customs clearing agents, Depot LSP(s) at Destination port.
11)Daily monitoring of LSPs activity and System Updation on regular basis.
12)Coordination with clearing agent to execute customs clearing process & takeing DO from the concerned shipping Line on time.13)Escalation of unresolved challenges to the exporter, shipping line and internally to "rate@Company.com" and collection team.
14)Upon Customs clearance and arriving of the shipment to the specified CFS, arrange for the local transportation to take the shipment at nearest Company depot.
15)Generate manual 2nd Leg ITR through SAP, refering the 1st Leg ITR and share the same to the depot, transporter & CHA to move the cargo from CFS to nearest Depot.
16)Upon reaching depot, arrange transportation to dispatch swaped sound Companys of same quantity to the consignee, generate the 3rd Leg ITR to move te shipment from Depot.
17)Track the shipment till it reached to its final destination.
18)File the original documents of Company BOE or send BOE to the concerned party through courier.
19)Follow-ups with LSP(s) to submit their Invoices on time and Processing of LSP Payments.(having excellent excel & analytical) skills along with basic knowledge of shipping trade.

job_description:
Job Responsibilities:
work end-to-end data analytics development and implementation cycle to ultimately create values to the businesses
Scrub, clean, prepare, and browse the data: fill in missing data values, determine outliers, regularize and normalize the data (e.g., names), engineer features, and transform it into a more useful form.
Explore and visualize the data using tools such as Python modules including pandas, matplotlib, bokeh, and Seaborn, Tableau, and Looker.
Build, evaluate, and document the models.
Generate plausible explanations for presentation to stakeholders and deployment.
Communicate results and ideas to key decision makers.
Work with data engineers to deploy the models, build data pipelines, and scalable systems.
Work with stakeholders to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive business analytics solutions.
Research and develop statistical learning models for data analysis.
Identify valuable data sources and automate collection processes.
Undertake preprocessing of structured and unstructured data.
Analyze large amounts of information to discover trends and patterns.
Build predictive models and machine-learning algorithms
Present information using data visualization techniques
Collaborate with sales, marketing and senior executive teams
Employ state-of-the-data machine learning algorithms to develop and validate predictive / prescriptive analytics
Work with Heads of Data and Analytics and Product Owners to understand business problems and assist in formulating the most appropriate data analytics approach.
Requirements:
7 to 10 yrs. of Industry experience and at least 5 years in Data Science domain.
Tertiary education in Data Science, Statistics, Actuary, Applied Mathematics
Knowledge and experience in supervised and unsupervised machine learning algorithms.
Knowledge and experience in Python , SQL and NoSQL
Experience in Cloud computing preferably Amazon Web Services, Sage maker, Athena, is a plus.
Strong communication skill in English; additional languages an advantage.

Transform large raw data into business insights
Apply statistical methods to analyze the effect of pricing and sales decisions on business performance. Such as (but not limited to) clustering, price elasticity, forecasting, deal/lead scoring, Price Optimization, multi-variable regression models to identify factors influencing price, hit rate
Build and interpret machine learning models on real business data
Experience training the tool to adhere to best practices, optimization concepts
Experience working with pricing guidance or deal scoring tools
Present the results and the corresponding recommendations to the relevant stakeholders
Immerse yourself in very large data sets and complex problems
Maintain pricing guidance tool end to end and support business requirements
Monthly pricing guidance performance reporting with focus on areas of improvement

job_description:
Independently complete conceptual, logical and physical data models for any supported platform, including SQL Data Warehouse, EMR, Spark, Data Bricks, Snowflake, Azure Synapse or other Cloud data warehousing technologies.
Governs data design/modeling - documentation of metadata (business definitions of entities and attributes) and constructions database objects, for baseline and investment funded projects, as assigned.
Provides and/or supports data analysis, requirements gathering, solution development, and design reviews for enhancements to, or new, applications/reporting.
Supports assigned project contractors (both on- & off-shore), orienting new contractors to standards, best practices, and tools.
Advocates existing Enterprise Data Design standards; assists in establishing and documenting new standards.
Contributes to project cost estimates, working with senior members of team to evaluate the size and complexity of the changes or new development.
Ensure physical and logical data models are designed with an extensible philosophy to support future, unknown use cases with minimal rework.
Develop a deep understanding of the business domain and enterprise technology inventory to craft a solution roadmap that achieves business objectives, maximizes reuse.
Partner with IT, data engineering and other teams to ensure the enterprise data model incorporates key dimensions needed for the proper management: business and financial policies, security, local-market regulatory rules, consumer privacy by design principles (PII management) and all linked across fundamental identity foundations.
Drive collaborative reviews of design, code, data, security features implementation performed by data engineers to drive data product development.
Assist with data planning, sourcing, collection, profiling, and transformation.
Create Source To Target Mappings for ETL and BI developers.
Show expertise for data at all levels: low-latency, relational, and unstructured data stores; analytical and data lakes; data streaming (consumption/production), data in-transit.
Develop reusable data models based on cloud-centric, code-first approaches to data management and cleansing.
Partner with the data science team to standardize their classification of unstructured data into standard structures for data discovery and action by business customers and stakeholders.
Support data lineage and mapping of source system data to canonical data stores for research, analysis and productization.
Qualifications:
10 years of overall technology experience that includes at least 2 years of data modelling and systems architecture.
5 years of experience with Data Lake Infrastructure, Data Warehousing, and Data Analytics tools.
5 years of experience developing enterprise data models.
5 years in cloud data engineering experience in at least one cloud (Azure, AWS, GCP).
5 years of experience with building solutions in the retail or in the supply chain space.
Expertise in data modelling tools (ER/Studio, Erwin, IDM/ARDM models).
Fluent with Azure cloud services. Azure Certification is a plus.
Experience scaling and managing a team of 5 data modelers
Experience with integration of multi cloud services with on-premises technologies.
Experience with data profiling and data quality tools like Apache Griffin, Deequ, and Great Expectations.
Experience with at least one MPP database technology such as Redshift, Synapse, Teradata, or Snowflake.
Experience with version control systems like GitHub and deployment & CI tools.
Experience with Azure Data Factory, Databricks and Azure Machine learning is a plus.
Experience of metadata management, data lineage, and data glossaries is a plus.
Working knowledge of agile development, including DevOps and DataOps concepts.
Familiarity with business intelligence tools (such as PowerBI).
BA/BS in Computer Science, Math, Physics, or other technical fields.
Skills, Abilities, Knowledge:
Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written, along with the ability to influence and demonstrate confidence in communications with senior level management.
Proven track record of leading, mentoring, hiring and scaling data teams.
Strong change manager. Comfortable with change, especially that which arises through company growth.
Ability to understand and translate business requirements into data and technical requirements.
High degree of organization and ability to manage multiple, competing projects and priorities simultaneously.
Positive and flexible attitude to enable adjusting to different needs in an ever-changing environment.
Strong leadership, organizational and interpersonal skills; comfortable managing trade-offs.
Foster a team culture of accountability, communication, and self-management.
Proactively drives impact and engagement while bringing others along.
Consistently attain/exceed individual and team goals
Ability to lead others without direct authority in a matrixed environment.
Differentiating Competencies Required
Ability to work with virtual teams (remote work locations); lead team of technical resources (employees and contractors) based in multiple locations across geographies
Lead technical discussions, driving clarity of complex issues/requirements to build robust solutions
Strong communication skills to meet with business, understand sometimes ambiguous, needs, and translate to clear, aligned requirements
Able to work independently with business partners to understand requirements quickly, perform analysis and lead the design review sessions.
Highly influential and having the ability to educate challenging stakeholders on the role of data and its purpose in the business.
Places the user in the center of decision making.
Teams up and collaborates for speed, agility, and innovation.
Experience with and embraces agile methodologies.
Strong negotiation and decision-making skill.
Experience managing and working with globally distributed teams

job_title: Web Analytics Data Insights Analyst / Sr. Analyst
job_description:
We are looking for a dynamic, detail oriented and versatile Web Analyst with strong business sense to join the A.com Web Analytics team! Adobe Spark is an exciting and fast-growing space that needs the right candidate to drive deep insights and generate value for its global customers. Your background is the right mix of deep technical skills and storytelling, which will be leveraged to mine large volumes of data and unlock significant findings that will have high impact for the business. In this role, you are tasked with analyzing and communicating, customer-centric and impactful insights, to your product and business partners by piecing together multiple sources of data. You are equally up to the task of getting into the details by digging deep into the data and crafting robust reporting solutions that help you and your partners scale efficiently.
What you will do:
Lead strategic analytics projects and present clearly communicated findings that lead to impactful insights for key partners.
Define standards and help build tools that will drive insights, enable business decisions and influence strategic plans and investments.
Multi-task and support ad-hoc analyses to understand customer behavior, investigate emerging trends and diagnose data discrepancies.
Build data pipelines and reporting solutions, mostly using Adobe Analytics clickstream, user profile and top of the funnel search data. Ramp up quickly as an authority of stitching and calibrating data across various data sources that relate to the customer s online behavior.
Partner with the Adobe.com Analytics Enablement team to understand, validate and occasionally architect instrumentation and data flow. Understand how instrumentation impacts data pipelines mentioned above.
Craft and build data sets for various use cases such as, but not limited to, investigative analyses and scalable reporting solutions.
Devise and share reporting requirements to partner teams tasked with building and maintaining productized reporting/data solutions.
Collaborate with other marketing analytics teams and researchers and augment holistic funnel measurement.
Collaborate with Search teams to measure and analyze impact of the top of funnel metrics all the way to customer behavior.
Collaborate with international counterparts to understand localization and improve measurement, forecasting, dashboarding and analyses to support all regional markets.
What you need to succeed:
Bachelor s degree in Business, Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems or a related field is required, masters preferred.
4+ years of relevant professional experience.
Strong analytical and quantitative problem-solving ability.
Experience with Adobe Analytics analysis and insight generation. Able to prioritize and establish analytics strategy to deliver impactful insights.
Strong proficiency in querying, manipulating and analyzing large data sets using SQL and/or SQLlike languages.
Experience working with Apache Hadoop and related technology stack like Hive, Presto etc.
Good attention to detail with the ability to stitch, calibrate and quality control multiple data sources.
Up to the challenge of exploring new areas and finding creative ways to circumvent data problems.
Ability to persistently navigate organizational challenges without losing sight of key goals.
Utilizes the right approach that makes efficient use of time and resources.
Self-starter.
Good communication skills.
Preferred Skills:
Web Analytics experience is highly desired.
Experience crafting A/B tests and analyzing subsequent results highly desired.
Experience with web clickstream data
Solid grasp of a data visualization tool such as Tableau or Power BI.
Knowledge of SEO tools (Google Search Console, BrightEdge) is a plus.
Knowledge of Data Science, Machine Learning, Statistical modeling techniques and data mining concepts is desirable.
Proficiency in Python/Anaconda.
Sophisticated Excel skills.

Roles and Responsibilities

LEAD DATA ANALYST:
In this role, youll lead a team which uses data, reporting and analytical skills to help answer business questions to make DAZN a data-driven company.
You and your team will be responsible for building datasets, using data visualisation tools (such as Tableau and Looker) and responding to data analysis requests from different business stakeholders. You will work with the BI Lead, based in London, to develop and test analytical output and reports to ensure they are usable and accurate before they are published.
Reporting
Key corporate reports (including business trading, functional KPIs and platform performance) will be your responsibility, which includes:
ensuring they deliver new and actionable insights
updating with changes defined by business stakeholders
migrating dashboards from existing tools to new ones
data visualisation tooling administration (user access controls, monthly reports on usage, identifying redundant dashboards etc.)
ensuring data governance of reports
Dataset Creation
Your team will be responsible for ensuring that datasets are created which can answer business questions and enable other technical users to query to get answers quickly. You will need to update and maintain the datasets as business definitions or data changes (e.g., new prices, new sports competitions).
Data Analysis
Ensuring key business questions from functions across DAZN (marketing, finance, product, operations, customer services) are answered via data and analysis in an organised and timely way will be your responsibility.
You will need to prioritise requests based on business value, importance, and urgency. Your team will collate, wrangle and query data from various data sources (e.g., Snowflake) to provide insight into what has happened and why. As your team develops their skills, you will apply statistical skills (measures of average, variance, distributions, trends analysis, outlier detection) to analyse data.
DO YOU HAVE THESE ESSENTIALS?
5 – 7 years of experience in working within data and analytics and experience leading a technical data team (analysts, engineers or scientists).
Strong experience collaborating with non-data stakeholders to understand their requirements and translate those into data products.
Ability to explain/present technical information to non-technical stakeholders logically and understandably.
You need a solution-based and proactive mindset, with the ability to translate business problems into technical problems that can be solved using data and analytics.
Strong management skills and a wide understanding of the coverage of data functions.
High focus on delivery, both in terms of speed and quality.
Working knowledge of the analytics pipeline (how data is collected and stored in databases, gathering business requirements, data wrangling, data preparation, quality assurance of analysis and methods of delivery and visualisation)
Very strong experience in data transformation, wrangling and statistical analysis using SQL and/or Python.
Experience in using data visualisation tools such as Tableau and Looker.
Desire to test and change the status quo and innovate.
NOT ESSENTIAL BUT GREAT IF YOU ALSO HAVE
A strong interest in sports, both as a fan and as an industry.
An interest in technology.
Enjoy working in an agile and fast-paced environment.
Experience in conducting A/B testing.
Experience in advanced analytics and data science.Desired Candidate Profile

Strong SQL skills
Experience using data record matching and deduplication techniques

job_description:
We are looking for a passionate certified Data Analyst. The successful candidate will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions.

Data Analyst Job Duties

Data analyst responsibilities include conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, activities and design. Data analysts will develop analysis and reporting capabilities. They will also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.

Responsibilities
1. Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports
2. Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality
3. Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems
4. Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets
5. Filter and clean data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems
6. Work with management to prioritize business and information needs
7. Locate and define new process improvement opportunities
8. Requirements
9. Proven working experience as a Data Analyst or Business Data Analyst
10. Technical expertise regarding data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques
11. Strong knowledge of and experience with reporting packages (Business Objects etc), databases (SQL etc), programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks)
12. Knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets (Excel, SPSS, SAS etc)
13. Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy
14. Adept at queries, report writing and presenting findings
15. BS in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics

JOB DETAILS

1.Importing/Collecting, cleaning, converting and analyzing the data for the purpose of find insights and making conclusions.
2.Presenting data in graphs, charts, tables, etc and designing and developing relational databases for collecting data.
3.Conduct research and make recommendations on data mining products, protocols, services, and standards in support of procurement and development efforts.
4.Monitor the performance of data mining system and if there are any issues then respond to the same.
5.Keep a track of trends, patterns and correlation in case of complex data sets.
6.Prepare concise data reports and data visualizations for the management that will help in decision making process.
7.Work closely with the IT team and data scientists to determine and achieve the organizational goals.
8.Assist the data scientist in development of new analytical tools and methods as and when required.
9.Create data definitions for new database file/table development and/or changes to existing ones as needed for analysis.
