About the Data Analyst position
We are looking for a certified Data Analyst who will help us turning data into information, getting insights and developing business decisions based on the analysis results. Your responsibilities will include conducting full lifecycle analysis to include requirements, activities and design and also monitor performance and quality control plans to identify improvements.

We expect you to possess analytical mindset with creative approach to tasks and the ability to find patterns and correlation when dealing with big volumes of information. You should also be able to work under a flexible schedule and report on your findings in a detailed and straightforward manner.

Data Analyst responsibilities are:

Manage databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality

Collect required data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports

Retrieve information from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/ data systems

Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets

Review computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems

Collaborate with management to prioritize business and information needs

Find and evaluate new process improvement opportunities

Data Analyst requirements are:

2 years' experience of working on a Data Analyst or Business Data Analyst position

Significant experience of working with data models, database design development, data mining and segmentation techniques

Excellent knowledge of statistics and experience using statistical packages for analyzing datasets, including Excel, SPSS, SAS and so on

Good practical experience with reporting packages (e. g. Business Objects), databases (SQL etc), programming (XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks)

Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze, and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy

Good report writing and presenting skills

BS degree in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management or Statistics

Interpret data, use statistical methods to examine outcomes, and produce continuous reports.

Discover and describe fresh opportunities for process improvement

Strong familiarity and practical expertise with reporting tools (such as Business Objects), databases (such as SQL), programming languages (such as XML, Javascript, or ETL frameworks), and statistical software for data analysis.
Proven experience as a Data Analyst or Business Data Analyst (Excel, SPSS, SAS, etc)
Adept at creating reports and presenting findings
Strong analytical abilities with the capacity to gather, organize, analyze, and communicate large volumes of information with attention to detail and accuracy
BS in Mathematics, Economics, Computer Science, Information Management, or Statistics.

EXPERIENCE
: 1-2 Years
JOB DETAILS
1.Importing/Collecting, cleaning, converting and analyzing the data for the purpose of find insights and making conclusions.
2.Presenting data in graphs, charts, tables, etc and designing and developing relational databases for collecting data.
3.Conduct research and make recommendations on data mining products, protocols, services, and standards in support of procurement and development efforts.
4.Monitor the performance of data mining system and if there are any issues then respond to the same.
5.Keep a track of trends, patterns and correlation in case of complex data sets.
6.Prepare concise data reports and data visualizations for the management that will help in decision making process.
7.Work closely with the IT team and data scientists to determine and achieve the organizational goals.
8.Assist the data scientist in development of new analytical tools and methods as and when required.
9.Create data definitions for new database file/table development and/or changes to existing ones as needed for analysis.

job_description:
Roles and Responsibilities as a Data Analyst.
Work with stakeholders throughout the organization to identify opportunities for leveraging company data to drive solutions.
Mine and analyse data from company databases to drive optimization and predictive modelling to increase and optimize product efficiency.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
Selecting features, building, and develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets using machine learning techniques. Contribute across advanced stages of deep learning model development including data collection, data cleaning, model development, validation, and deployment.
Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.
Draw insights and find solutions by manipulating Satellite imagery, vertical imagery, ocean level imagery, GPS traces, etc. individually and by fusing several combinations of these sources. Use these sources individually or their combinations to predict various map features like route optimisation and attributes by training statistical models/ ML models

Strong problem-solving skills with an emphasis on data science techniques.

Knowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques (clustering, decision tree learning, random forest, artificial neural networks, etc.), advanced statistical techniques and concepts (regression, properties of distributions, statistical tests, and proper usage, etc.) and their real-world advantages/drawbacks.
Hands-on with numpy, pandas, sklearn, OpenCV, Tensor Flow, Caffe, Keras, Pytorch, CUDA, OpenCL, OpenGL
Knowledge and experience in Deep Learning-based architectures (DNN/CNN/ RNN/ LSTM/SSD/LSTM-RNN for Fine-tuning/Transfer Learning/Training), Object Detection, Classification, Segmentation task-based models, etc. Customization of NN and improving performance
Excellent written and verbal communication skills for coordinating across teams.
A drive to learn and master new technologies and techniques.

Interested in starting or advancing an early career in Data Analysis and have some previous direct or indirect experience in performing data analysis.
Can see value in the role data can play in improving the public school education ecosystem.
Inquisitive, asks questions and is eager to learn.
Preferred to have programming experience (Python, R & others) and working knowledge in Excel, query languages, database systems and visualization tools.
Identify & define a problem and solve it by breaking things down into smaller steps and using data in an organized and step-by-step manner.
Good written and oral communication skills, interpersonal skills and networking skills.
Experiences working with government and in education sector is desirable, though not necessary
High level of spoken and written fluency in English and Tamil

job_description:
Key Responsibilities:
Perform detailed data analysis to understand data propagation through our systems/applications and document/code the data transformation rules/logic. Participate in Requirement Analysis discussions to understand and document data requirements. Perform data profiling and analyze results to identify data quality issues. Identify master sources for data sets and ensure data is provisioned from these master sources only.
Document metadata of data sets, interfaces, datastores and databases using standard enterprise metadata management tools. Design and document data structures for databases and data exchanges using industry standard modelling notations and tools. Provide data analysis support to in-flight and new projects in adherence with Standard Data Architecture. Support and resolve data issues and queries raised by internal customers. Problem solving internal challenges and creating innovative solutions.
Key Requirements:
Minimum bachelor s degree in computer science or related field. 2-4 years of experience working with data in a Data Analyst role or something similar. 1 years of coding experience in any language. Python experience preferred. 2 years experience working with any relational database management system (RDBMS). Any experience with Data Modelling will be beneficial. Knowledge about cloud services on AWS, NoSQL and Graph databases.
AWS certification or hands-on experience is as added advantage. Excellent verbal communication and interpersonal skills. Quick learner, self starter and strong analytical, collaboration influencing skills. Passionate and curious about data with strong commitment to producing quality deliverables. Lean/Agile mindset and experience with the ability to pivot and manage multiple priorities.

- Using automated tools to extract data from primary and secondary sources
- Removing corrupted data and fixing coding errors and related problems
- Developing and maintaining databases, data systems
- Reorganizing data in a readable format
- Performing analysis to assess quality and meaning of data
- Filter Data by reviewing reports and performance indicators to identify and correct code problems
- Using statistical tools to identify, analyze, and interpret patterns and trends in complex data
sets that could be helpful for the diagnosis and prediction
- Preparing final analysis reports for the stakeholders to understand the data-analysis steps, enabling them to take important decisions based on various facts and trends.
Skills and Qualifications :
- Knowledge of programming languages like SQL and Python
- Knowledge of data visualization software like Bigquery, (any one at least).
- Technical proficiency regarding database design development, data models, techniques for
data mining, and segmentation.
- Problem-solving skills
- Accuracy and attention to detail
- Adept at queries, writing reports, and making presentations
- BE/BTech in Computer Science
- 2-4 years of experience in relevant data analysis projects

job_description:
This role will give you the opportunity to...
Build, design, and maintain reports and dashboards
Work with data and perform deep dive analyses on various topics such as player journeys, live events, user acquisition, etc.
Work closely with product and marketing teams to review data and extract storylines trends aligned to Highrise growth
Identify trends and behaviors that influence performance and player engagement
To be successful in this role, wed expect you to ...
Have a university degree in Computer Science, Math, Economics, Statistics, or other quantitative fields
Have 5 years of hands-on experience in quantitative analysis and a proven track record of significantly impacting product growth by providing data findings
Extensive knowledge of relational databases, SQL, Python and working with large datasets
Have an entrepreneurial mindset
Have experience with analytics for consumer apps (strongly preferred)
Have the ambition to own the reporting and analysis functions for the Highrise metaverse
Have excellent written and oral communication skills with the ability to explain complex data clearly
Bonus if you have:
Experience as a team lead, or you have aspirations to build and lead a team in the future
Experience with data analytics for a mobile app or mobile gaming products
Familiarity with technologies such as Amplitude, AWS, Redshift to build and optimize production data pipelines
Understanding of machine learning, data science
Within 3 months, youll...
Grasp and identify gaps in our analytics infrastructure
Get familiar with Product and Marketing (UA) processes and their data requirements
Get to know the product and marketing teams, as well as understand their analytics needs
Begin working with product and marketing to craft questions and answer them with data
Within 6 months, youll...
Take ownership of data infrastructure for analytics
Proactively utilize data and present the finding to Product and Marketing teams
Suggest actionable points for improving the product and marketing efforts
Help structure and build the first Data Team
